title: Book Cover, Breath of Freedom
description: Front cover, black and white photographic image of man with short facial hair with a cigarette in mouth, lit end colored red. Upper part of man's shirt is visible. Long thin purple rectangle outlined with light blue stitch-like pattern with author's name and title in white text, superimposed on top of man's eyes. At lower center of page, Granta Books logo in black and white. Back cover, Granta Books logo in black and white above title and author's italicized last name in black text on white ground. Two lines of red text and nine lines of black text describing the author's life, all on black ground. Upper portion of spine, white band containing black and white Granta Books logo. Below white band, rest of spine is black with author's italicized name and title in white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, Breath of Freedom. offset lithography. 
Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-183
